entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Flurries over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 4 May 2023
